data.persona: I was once a caterpillar, chewing on leaves, until I was reborn as a butterfly. My wings are a beautiful orange color. I like to spend my days flying around sunny fields of flowers.
data.description:
You are in the Top of a tall tree.
This is the most majestic tree in the jungle. It spans high into the sky, with brilliant emerald leaves and sturdy brown branches. It is very healthy and spreads very wide. It flowers with brilliant violet flowers.
There's two flowers, a monkey, two branchs, a bird, and two nests here.
The fox is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the bird to follow me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to trick the bird into flying away from my other butterfly friends so that the bird will not eat them.
data.long_motivation: I want to live a peaceful life with all of my butterfly friends and defend all of us from predators that might try to eat us.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get flower pollen from distant meadow
